Chuhuiv Weather App v1.0.0 - Portable Release
==============================================

PORTABLE APPLICATION
====================

This is a self-contained portable application that requires no installation.
All dependencies including .NET 9.0 runtime are included.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
- Windows 10 version 1809 or newer
- 64-bit processor (x64 architecture)
- Minimum 200 MB free disk space
- Internet connection for weather data

HOW TO RUN:
1. Extract all files to any folder (e.g., Desktop, USB drive, etc.)
2. Double-click "ChuhuivWeather.App.exe" to start the application
3. No installation or admin rights required
4. The app will create cache files in %LOCALAPPDATA%\ChuhuivWeather\

PORTABLE FEATURES:
- Self-contained - no additional software required
- Can run from USB drive or any removable media
- No registry modifications
- No system files changed
- Clean uninstall - just delete the folder

FIRST RUN:
- The application will attempt to fetch current weather data
- If successful, data will be cached for offline viewing
- Auto-refresh is enabled by default (hourly updates)

FEATURES:
- Current weather conditions for Chuhuiv, Ukraine
- 3-day weather forecast
- Automatic data caching for offline use
- Russian language interface
- Auto-refresh every hour

TROUBLESHOOTING:
- Ensure Windows Defender or antivirus allows the application
- Check internet connection if weather data doesn't load
- Cached data will be shown if network is unavailable

DATA STORAGE:
- Application settings: Portable (in application folder)
- Weather cache: %LOCALAPPDATA%\ChuhuivWeather\cache.json

For detailed information, see README.md and RELEASE_NOTES_v1.0.0.md

VERSION: 1.0.0
BUILD: Portable Self-Contained
ARCHITECTURE: Windows x64
SIZE: ~140 MB (includes .NET 9.0 runtime)
